sms_sms_templates_informations_text_1: To send an SMS to the US, you will need to validate the message templates beforehand.
sms_sms_templates_informations_text_2: Only transactional, alert and two-factor authentication messages are authorised. Advertising SMS templates are not accepted.
sms_sms_templates_informations_text_3: Once you have set your templates, the SMS will be sent the same way as for other countries. The compatibility search with a template is done automatically.
sms_sms_templates_informations_text_4: You can request validation for multiple message templates. The variable parts of the template can be defined, and must be marked up with the # character.
sms_sms_templates_informations_text_6: For demonstration purposes, the following message templates are available without validation:
sms_sms_templates_informations_text_8: The #OBJECT# of ID #ID# is in fail state: #ERROR#.
sms_sms_templates_informations_text_9: Your package number #PACKAGENUMBER# has been delivered to your address #ADDRESS#.
sms_sms_templates_informations_example_d: Your security code is: #CODE#. Have a good day.
Our monitoring system has detected that your #SERVER# server is not responding.
Hello #LOGIN#, your OVHcloud Control Panel has been created on www.ovhcloud.com.
sms_sms_templates_list_empty: You do not have any templates.
sms_sms_templates_add_name_error_maxleng: The name must be less than 249 characters
sms_sms_templates_add_message_error_maxl: The template must be less than 249 characters
sms_sms_templates_add_message_error_minl: Template must be at least 31 characters
sms_sms_templates_add_description_error_: Description must be less than 249 characters
Description must be at least 31 characters
